00061 /*
00062  * auth_none.c
00063  * Creates a client authentication handle for passing "null" 
00064  * credentials and verifiers to remote systems. 
00065  * 
00066  * Copyright (C) 1984, Sun Microsystems, Inc. 
00067  */
00068 
00069 #include "Types.h"
00070 #include "Xdr.h"
00071 #include "Rpc.h"
00072 #include "Auth.h"
00073 #define MAX_MARSHEL_SIZE 20
00074 
00075 /*
00076  * Authenticator operations routines
00077  */
00078 static void       Authnone_verf();
00079 static void       Authnone_destroy();
00080 static bool_t   Authnone_marshal();
00081 static bool_t   Authnone_validate();
00082 static bool_t   Authnone_refresh();
00083 static bool_t Authnone_wrap() ;
00084 static bool_t Authnone_unwrap() ;
00085 
00086 static struct Auth_ops Authnone_ops = {
00087         Authnone_verf,
00088         Authnone_marshal,
00089         Authnone_validate,
00090         Authnone_refresh,
00091         Authnone_destroy,
00092   Authnone_wrap, 
00093   Authnone_unwrap
00094 };
00095 
00096 static struct Authnone_private {
00097         AUTH    no_client;
00098         char    marshalled_client[MAX_MARSHEL_SIZE];
00099         u_int   mcnt;
00100 } *Authnone_private;
00101 
00102 AUTH * Authnone_create( void )
00103 {
00104         register struct Authnone_private *ap = Authnone_private;
00105         XDR xdr_stream;
00106         register XDR *xdrs;
00107 
00108         if (ap == 0) {
00109                 ap = (struct Authnone_private *)mem_calloc(1, sizeof (*ap));
00110                 if (ap == 0)
00111                         return (0);
00112                 Authnone_private = ap;
00113         }
00114         if (!ap->mcnt) {
00115                 ap->no_client.ah_cred = ap->no_client.ah_verf = _null_auth;
00116                 ap->no_client.ah_ops = &Authnone_ops;
00117                 xdrs = &xdr_stream;
00118                 Xdrmem_create(xdrs, ap->marshalled_client, (u_int)MAX_MARSHEL_SIZE,
00119                     XDR_ENCODE);
00120                 (void)Xdr_opaque_auth(xdrs, &ap->no_client.ah_cred);
00121                 (void)Xdr_opaque_auth(xdrs, &ap->no_client.ah_verf);
00122                 ap->mcnt = XDR_GETPOS(xdrs);
00123                 XDR_DESTROY(xdrs);
00124         }
00125         return (&ap->no_client);
00126 }
00127 
00128 static bool_t Authnone_marshal( AUTH * auth , XDR * xdrs)
00129 {
00130         register struct Authnone_private *ap = Authnone_private;
00131 
00132         if (ap == 0)
00133                 return (0);
00134         return ((*xdrs->x_ops->x_putbytes)(xdrs,
00135             ap->marshalled_client, ap->mcnt));
00136 }
00137 
00138 static void Authnone_verf( AUTH * auth )
00139 {
00140 }
00141 
00142 static bool_t Authnone_validate( AUTH * auth, struct opaque_auth * verf )
00143 {
00144         return (TRUE);
00145 }
00146 
00147 static bool_t Authnone_refresh( AUTH * auth)
00148 {
00149         return (FALSE);
00150 }
00151 
00152 static void Authnone_destroy( AUTH * auth )
00153 {
00154 }
00155 
00156 static bool_t Authnone_wrap( AUTH * auth, XDR * xdrs, Xdrproc_t xdr_func, caddr_t xdr_ptr )
00157 {
00158   return ((*xdr_func)(xdrs, xdr_ptr));
00159 } 
00160 
00161 static bool_t Authnone_unwrap( AUTH * auth, XDR * xdrs, Xdrproc_t xdr_func, caddr_t xdr_ptr )
00162 {
00163   return ((*xdr_func)(xdrs, xdr_ptr)); 
00164 }
